# setImageURL(_:forTraits:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ TV Services ](/documentation/tvservices)

- [ TVContentItem ](/documentation/tvservices/tvcontentitem)

- [ setImageURL(_:forTraits:) ](/documentation/TVServices/TVContentItem/setImageURL(_:forTraits:))

- [ TVContentItem ](/documentation/tvservices/tvcontentitem)

-  setImageURL(_:forTraits:) 

Instance Method# setImageURL(_:forTraits:)

tvOS 11.0–13.0Deprecated

```
func setImageURL(
    _ aURL: URL?,
    forTraits traits: TVContentItemImageTrait
)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/TVServices/TVContentItem/setImageURL(_:forTraits:)#parameters)

`aURL`The URL corresponding to the image location. This parameter can be an absolute path on the local device or an HTTP path. Specify `nil` to remove the image associated with the given traits.

`traits`The traits to associate with the image. For example, you might specify that the image applies only to dark interfaces.

## [Discussion](/documentation/TVServices/TVContentItem/setImageURL(_:forTraits:)#Discussion)

The preferred file format for this image is a layered image file that provides the proper 3d effects. For more information, see [App Programming Guide for tvOS](https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Conceptual/AppleTV_PG/index.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40015241).

## [See Also](/documentation/TVServices/TVContentItem/setImageURL(_:forTraits:)#see-also)

### [Accessing Image Resources](/documentation/TVServices/TVContentItem/setImageURL(_:forTraits:)#Accessing-Image-Resources)

[`var imageURL: URL?`](/documentation/tvservices/tvcontentitem/imageurl)A URL giving the location of the image to be displayed for this content item.Deprecated[`func imageURL(forTraits: TVContentItemImageTrait) -> URL?`](/documentation/tvservices/tvcontentitem/imageurl(fortraits:))Retrieve the URL for the image that best matches the specified traits.Deprecated[`struct TVContentItemImageTrait`](/documentation/tvservices/tvcontentitemimagetrait)Traits describing the type of image you want.
